cpci_empty_project: You don't have a Public Cloud server yet.
cpci_public_cloud_soon_help: Your OVH Cloud servers will soon be able to communicate across a private network, without sending any traffic over the Internet. This service will be available in the first half of 2016.
cpci_errors_init_title: An error has occurred retrieving details on your infrastructure.
cpci_errors_init_help3: If the problem persists, you can contact support by clicking here.
cloud_ip_action_detach: Remove the IP from the server
cpci_vm_ERROR: There has been a problem with "{{server}}" (ID Openstack Nova: {{id}})
cpci_vm_ips_getting_error: Oops, we were unable to retrieve the list of IPs
cpci_ip_delete_submit_error: Oops, we were unable to delete this IP
cpci_ip_reverse_info_soon: You will soon be able to modify the reverse DNS for this continent
cpci_vm_alert_cpu: Your CPU has used over {{percentage}} of the power allocated in the last 7 days.
cpci_vm_alert_ram: Your RAM has reached over {{percentage}} of the space used in the last 7 days.
cpci_vm_delete_submit_success: This server will be deleted in a few moments.
cpci_vm_delete_submit_error: An error has occurred submitting the deletion request for this server: {{message}}
cpci_vm_reinstall_submit_success: This server will be reinstalled in a few minutes.
cpci_vm_reinstall_submit_error: An error has occurred submitting the reinstallation request for this server: {{message}}
cpci_vm_reboot_submit_success: The request for rebooting the server has been processed.
cpci_vm_reboot_submit_error: An error has occurred rebooting this server: {{message}}
cpci_vm_resume_submit_error: There was an error when activating this server.
cpci_vm_rescue_end_error: Oops! We're unable to bring the server out of rescue mode: {{message}}
cpcivm_edit_vm_login_info_linux:
In order to connect to this machine, open a terminal and enter the following command :
ssh {{user}}@{{ip}}
cpcivm_edit_vm_login_info_windows:
When you connect for the first time, you have to use the VNC console to finish configuring Windows. Then, use your preferred RDP client, for example from a Linux terminal:
rdesktop {{ip}}
cpci_confirm_attach_question: If you attach IP {{ip}} to instance {{futurInstanceAttach}}, it will be removed from instance {{currentInstanceAttach}}. Are you sure you want to proceed?
cpci_confirm_floating_attach_question: You are about to attach the {{ip}} IP to the {{futurInstanceAttach}} instance. Are you sure you want to continue?
cpci_ip_attach_error: We are unable to attach IP {{ip}} from instance "{{instance}}".
cpci_ip_detach_error: We are unable to remove IP {{ip}} from instance "{{instance}}".
cpci_ip_attach_success: IP {{ip}} will be attached to instance "{{instance}}" in a few moments.
cpci_ip_attach_failover_help: You can now configure your failover IP.
cpci_ip_detach_success: IP {{ip}} will be removed from instance "{{instance}}" in a few moments.
cpci_ipfo_import_success: Failover IP {{ip}} has been imported into your project.
cpci_ipfo_import_error: Error: unable to import Failover IP {{ip}}. Please try again later.
cpci_ipfo_attach_question: Tick the server that you what to attach the IP to{{ip}}.
cpci_ipfo_attach_error: You currently have no active compatible instance with this IP's geolocation.
cpci_volume_attach_error: You have no compatible instance that you can attach this volume to.
cpci_volume_delete_error: Oops. We were unable to delete this hard disk.
cpci_volume_add_from_snapshot_error: Oops, we cannot recover snapshot information.
cpci_volume_snapshotted_delete_info: This disk has been backed up and there are still snapshots available. You must delete the disk snapshots before deleting the disk.
cpci_volume_snapshot_error: Oops, an error occurred when retrieving information about this volume.

cpci_volume_confirm_move_question: Detach the {{volume}} hard disk from instance {{srcVm}} to attach it to instance {{targetVm}}?
cpci_volume_moveCheckbox_question_invali: Select the server to which you wish to add the {{volume}} hard disk.
cpci_volume_moveCheckbox_question_valid: Attach the {{volume}} hard disk to instance {{targetVm}}?
cpci_volume_confirm_detach_error: Oops. We were unable to detach the hard disk from the instance.
cpci_volume_confirm_attach_windows_info: Attention: you need to reboot your server once the operation has finished to finalise reattaching the instance.
cpci_vrack_vlan_more_information: You can use private networks after they have been linked to a vRack. (Communication between products will be made possible later). More information
cpci_private_network_query_error: Oops, the list of private networks could not be retrieved.
cpci_vrack_vlan_api_only: At the moment you can only create private networks (VLANs) in your vRack via our API. You can also view the deploymentroadmap.
